Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Oak
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB via Clark, Chicago, and State; NB via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

Southbound buses will operate via  Clark, Chicago, and State. 

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line trains running w/ delays after  earlier police activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after  earlier police activity at Roosevelt.
 
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
 
Allow extra travel time.
